system.requirements:
Arch-Heretek Alternate Advance, 500xp
Electrograft Use, Mechanicus Implants
system.effect: Character gains +20 to Tech-Use and Security Tests to gain unauthorised access to electronic systems using a Cogitator or Electronic Lock as long as they can connect to it with their implants.

description.value: Character gains +20 to Tech-Use and Security Tests to gain unauthorised access to electronic systems using a Cogitator or Electronic Lock as long as they can connect to it with their implants.
